item.title: AdSense Text Ads Get New Look on Mobile - WebProNews
item.description:
AdSense Text Ads Get New Look on Mobile - WebProNews

Google announced that AdSense text ads now have a new look on mobile. The redesign has apparently already rolled out on mobile sites, so you should be able to see them from your device right now. "This new format allows for higher performance with a more beautiful and user-friendly appearance," says Google's Clyde Li.

Get Your Apps Ready for the Holidays - News and Updates - Apple Developer

item.title: Dropbox Shuts Down Carousel And Mailbox - WebProNews
item.description:
Dropbox Shuts Down Carousel And Mailbox - WebProNews

Dropbox announced on Monday that it is shutting down its Carousel and Mailbox products on March 31st and February 26th respectively. From the sound of it, key features and ideas from these products will be utilized in the Dropbox app.
